permissions: User can create confirmations if they can update the related job production plan or if the resource is a Laborer whose user is the current user.
side_effects: Creates a crew assignment confirmation. The server sets confirmed_by to the current user and sets confirmed_at to now if blank. Crew requirement/resource/start_at may be derived from assignment_confirmation_uuid, or assignment_confirmation_uuid may be derived from crew_requirement/resource/start_at.
validation_notes: Provide either --assignment-confirmation-uuid or the combination of --crew-requirement, --resource-type, --resource-id, and --start-at. --resource-type and --resource-id must be provided together. assignment_confirmation_uuid and start_at are required by the model; assignment_confirmation_uuid must be unique; resource must match the crew requirement's resource.

flags.name: --crew-requirement
flags.validation: Required with --resource-type, --resource-id, and --start-at when --assignment-confirmation-uuid is not provided.

flags.name: --resource-type
flags.validation: Required with --resource-id when using crew requirement path.

flags.name: --resource-id
flags.validation: Required with --resource-type when using crew requirement path.

flags.name: --start-at
flags.validation: ISO 8601 timestamp. Required with --crew-requirement/--resource-type/--resource-id when --assignment-confirmation-uuid not provided.

flags.name: --confirmed-by
flags.validation: Server sets confirmed_by to current user on create.
